title: @Riot@EVERYONE It's my B-day tomorrow Pls help
body: So since tomorrow is my birthday, i wanted to go ahead and buy myself something League of Legends merchandise like the kind i see everyone wearing at the LCS and other events. So please post links to where i can find good legit places to buy a Teemo hat from among other items. Thanks.{{champion:17}} I wonder if it put this discussion under the right kind of board.

replies.body:
Happy Birthday, TOY W4RRIOR! :3 

https://pbs.twimg.com/media/BsmJUjzCcAAmGYL.jpg

I second the jinx.com recommendation! (I'm partial to the Lux shirt.)

Did you draw this, or did someone draw it for you? For some reason i want a champion poro now. Thanks for the help, im most likely going to buy a Teemo hat and either a shirt or a hoodie. Torn between the all these items... http://www.jinx.com/p/league_of_legends_morgana_pool_party_premium_tee.html?catid=&preview=1&s=leagueoflegends
http://www.jinx.com/p/league_of_legends_graggy_ice_premium_tee.html?catid=&preview=1&s=leagueoflegends
http://www.jinx.com/p/league_of_legends_baron_face_pullover_hoodie.html?catid=&preview=1&s=leagueoflegends
http://www.jinx.com/p/league_of_legends_singed_premium_tee.html?catid=&preview=1&s=leagueoflegends
http://www.jinx.com/p/league_of_legends_have_you_seen_my_tibbers_premium_tee.html?catid=&preview=1&s=leagueoflegends
http://www.jinx.com/p/league_of_legends_ziggs_premium_tee.html?catid=&preview=1&s=leagueoflegends
http://www.jinx.com/p/league_of_legends_okay_premium_tee.html?catid=&preview=1&s=leagueoflegends

I drew him! I'm actually drawing a Poro a day for a sketch challenge! :3 If you'd like to suggest an idea, I'm going until the end of the month! (I really need ideas, 31 is a lot of different kinds of Poros!)

That Ziggs shirt is awsome. That's my vote!

I'd love to see an Urgot Poro personally! 

Heck, I got plenty of Poro-related ides if you need inspiration!

You could make Poro's based off of Popular Skin Themes, like:

Full Metal Poro

Gentleman Poro

Scorched Earth Poro

Void Poro

Pentakill Poro (They need a Mascot anyways!)

Commando Poro

Special Forces Poro

Arcade Poro

Cryocore/Frostfire Poro

Surprise Party Poro
I just got really excited to do a Pentakill Poro. :o

2 Poros i always wanted was a Teemo based Poro, and a Braum based Poro. League of Poros. 
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-9LCxNC0bef8/UgkYcwY-VAI/AAAAAAAAOAo/ON57I4sW0mk/s1600/7EuMwyvh.jpg
Just type in Poros lol into Google images and you can find lots of these. Personal favorite was the Lee Sin Poro.

SO. CUTE. OMGOSH. 

I love the Rengar Poro! (I may also have a cat named Rengar...)

Going through an old post and saw this lol, now I wish I had a cat just to name it Rengar, better yet a tiger :D
But im a {{champion:75}}  person
If it wasn't for the baby blue color, i'd wear that shirt. I would prefer maybe a white, black, or yellow color for the shirt.
From everyone's comments to my family, i had a really good birthday yesterday. By the way everyone i recommend you guys go watch The Purge:Anarchy, better than the first one by a loooooooooooooooot.

So solid.

http://www.jinx.com/p/league_of_legends_have_you_seen_my_tibbers_premium_tee.html?catid=&preview=1&s=leagueoflegends

I believe they have women's styles as well for this shirt.
